Transcription for 1013676

Wadadukru.
Yisra'el innenul buit del reference me.
Jo ch ve Yisra'el me ne telling yisara'eh
He lives in the house in which I walk,
And in the world best of all,
I am alive for you,
I am alive for you.
Dear son, you are in love,
And will and love above,
Love without their body or mood,
Yes, he whispers by you,
Love my glory with all day,
For you are my love within,
Love is like the moon,
Love is like the moon.
